mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_ROLE_CODE = 'ME' AND (CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 = #{ctCode} OR CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2 = #{ctCode} OR CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3 = #{ctCode})
SELECT * FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_ROLE_CODE = 'ME'

SELECT *, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE=CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME1, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE=CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME2, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE=CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME3 FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_MEMBER_CODE=#{csMemberCode}
SELECT * FROM TBL_QUESTION WHERE QS_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE=#{csMemberCode}

SELECT PA_ID, TICKET_CODE, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE=(SELECT CENTER_CODE FROM TBL_TICKET WHERE TK_CODE=pay.TICKET_CODE)) AS CENTER_NAME, PA_AMOUNT, MEMBER_CODE, PA_METHOD, PA_DATETIME, (SELECT TK_NAME FROM TBL_TICKET WHERE TK_CODE=pay.TICKET_CODE) AS TICKET_NAME FROM TBL_PAYMENT pay WHERE MEMBER_CODE=#{csMemberCode} AND PA_CANCEL_YN=FALSE
SELECT TK_CODE, TK_NAME, TK_USAGE_COUNT FROM TBL_TICKET WHERE TK_CODE=#{tkCode}

SELECT R.RS_DATETIME, (L.LS_DATE::TIMESTAMP + L.LS_TIME::TIME)::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE AS COMBINED_DATETIME, L.LS_NAME, C.CS_NAME AS TRAINER_MEMBER_NAME, CT.CT_NAME AS CENTER_NAME, R.RS_DATETIME AS RS_DATETIME FROM TBL_RESERV R JOIN TBL_LESSON L ON R.LESSON_CODE = L.LS_CODE JOIN TBL_CST C ON L.TRAINER_MEMBER_CODE = C.CS_MEMBER_CODE JOIN TBL_CENTER CT ON L.CENTER_CODE = CT.CT_CODE WHERE R.MEMBER_CODE = #{csMemberCode} AND R.RS_CANCEL_YN = FALSE ORDER BY COMBINED_DATETIME DESC;
SELECT * FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_ROLE_CODE = 'TR' AND (CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 = #{ctCode} OR CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2 = #{ctCode} OR CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3 = #{ctCode})
SELECT * FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_ROLE_CODE = 'TR'
SELECT * FROM TBL_CENTER_REQUEST WHERE CENTER_CODE=#{ctCode} AND CR_CONNECTION_YN=FALSE AND MEMBER_CODE < 8000 AND CR_REJECT_DATE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM TBL_CENTER_REQUEST WHERE CENTER_CODE=#{ctCode} AND CR_CONNECTION_YN=FALSE AND MEMBER_CODE > 8000 AND CR_REJECT_DATE IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CENTER_CONN VALUES(#{crCode}, #{memberCode}, #{centerCode}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, TRUE)
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_CST SET CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 = CASE WHEN CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 = 0 THEN #{centerCode} ELSE CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 END, CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2 = CASE WHEN CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 != 0 AND CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2 = 0 THEN #{centerCode} ELSE CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2 END, CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3 = CASE WHEN CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 != 0 AND CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2 != 0 AND CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3 = 0 THEN #{centerCode} ELSE CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3 END WHERE CS_MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM TBL_CENTER_REQUEST WHERE CR_CODE=#{crCode}
SELECT * FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_MEMBER_CODE=#{csMemberCode}

SELECT LS_NAME,LS_DATE,LS_CLOSE_YN, TO_CHAR(ls_time, 'AM HH:MI') AS LS_TIME, TO_CHAR(ls_time + INTERVAL '50 minutes', 'AM HH:MI') AS LS_END_TIME, (LS_DATE::TIMESTAMP + LS_TIME::TIME)::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE AS COMBINED_DATETIME, (LS_DATE::TIMESTAMP + TO_CHAR(ls_time + INTERVAL '50 minutes', 'AM HH:MI')::TIME)::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE AS COMBINED_END_DATETIME FROM TBL_LESSON WHERE trainer_member_code=#{csMemberCode} AND ls_type='그룹' AND LS_DATE = CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY COMBINED_DATETIME DESC

SELECT LS_NAME,LS_DATE,LS_CLOSE_YN, TO_CHAR(ls_time, 'AM HH:MI') AS LS_TIME, TO_CHAR(ls_time + INTERVAL '50 minutes', 'AM HH:MI') AS LS_END_TIME, (LS_DATE::TIMESTAMP + LS_TIME::TIME)::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE AS COMBINED_DATETIME, (LS_DATE::TIMESTAMP + TO_CHAR(ls_time + INTERVAL '50 minutes', 'AM HH:MI')::TIME)::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE AS COMBINED_END_DATETIME FROM TBL_LESSON WHERE trainer_member_code=#{csMemberCode} AND ls_type='개인' AND LS_DATE = CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY COMBINED_DATETIME DESC

SELECT LS_NAME,LS_DATE,LS_CLOSE_YN,LS_TYPE, TO_CHAR(ls_time, 'AM HH:MI') AS LS_TIME, TO_CHAR(ls_time + INTERVAL '50 minutes', 'AM HH:MI') AS LS_END_TIME, (LS_DATE::TIMESTAMP + LS_TIME::TIME)::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE AS COMBINED_DATETIME, (LS_DATE::TIMESTAMP + TO_CHAR(ls_time + INTERVAL '50 minutes', 'AM HH:MI')::TIME)::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE AS COMBINED_END_DATETIME FROM TBL_LESSON WHERE trainer_member_code=#{csMemberCode} ORDER BY COMBINED_DATETIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN ls_type = '그룹' THEN 1 END) AS GROUP_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN ls_type = '개인' THEN 1 END) AS PERSONAL_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN ls_type = '그룹' AND ls_close_yn = true THEN 1 END) AS CLOSED_GROUP_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN ls_type = '개인' AND ls_close_yn = true THEN 1 END) AS CLOSED_PERSONAL_COUNT FROM tbl_lesson WHERE DATE_TRUNC('month', ls_date) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '1 month' AND trainer_member_code = #{csMemberCode}

SELECT T1.CS_MEMBER_CODE, T1.CS_EMAIL_ID, T1.CS_NAME, T1.CS_PHONE_NUMBER1, T1.CS_PHONE_NUMBER2, T1.CS_PHONE_NUMBER3, T1.CS_REGISTRATION_DATE, T1.CS_BIRTH, T1.CS_GENDER_MW, T1.CS_DELETE_YN, T1.CS_REGISTRATION_TYPE, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE = T1.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME1, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE = T1.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME2, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE = T1.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME3 FROM TBL_CST T1 WHERE T1.CS_ROLE_CODE = 'ME' ORDER BY T1.CS_MEMBER_CODE DESC

SELECT T1.CS_MEMBER_CODE, T1.CS_EMAIL_ID, T1.CS_NAME, T1.CS_PHONE_NUMBER1, T1.CS_PHONE_NUMBER2, T1.CS_PHONE_NUMBER3, T1.CS_REGISTRATION_DATE, T1.CS_BIRTH, T1.CS_GENDER_MW, T1.CS_DELETE_YN, T1.CS_REGISTRATION_TYPE, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE = T1.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME1, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE = T1.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME2, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE = T1.CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3) AS CONNECTED_CENTER_NAME3 FROM TBL_CST T1 WHERE T1.CS_ROLE_CODE = 'TR' ORDER BY T1.CS_MEMBER_CODE DESC
